We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private KeltnerChannels _kch;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_kch = KCH(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_kch.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Middle Band", _kch.MiddleBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Upper Band", _kch.UpperBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Lower Band", _kch.LowerBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Average True Range", _kch.AverageTrueRange);
    Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Current", _kch.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.kch = self.KCH(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.kch.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Middle Band", self.kch.MiddleBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Upper Band", self.kch.UpperBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Lower Band", self.kch.LowerBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Average True Range", self.kch.AverageTrueRange);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KCH Current", self.kch.Current);
